title: Counterfactual Forecasting of Human Behavior using Generative AI and Causal Graphs
summary: This study presents a novel framework for counterfactual user behavior forecasting that combines structural causal models with transformer-based generative artificial intelligence. To model fictitious situations, the method creates causal graphs that map the connections between user interactions, adoption metrics, and product features.
